game.name: Oh Puck!
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Compete in the first ever curling party game! Slide, punch, and sabotage your friends in chaotic matches filled with special items. Outplay, outsmart, and out-slide your rivals in the ultimate frozen showdown!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Compete in the first ever curling party game! Slide, punch, and sabotage your friends in chaotic matches filled with special items. Outplay, outsmart, and out-slide your rivals in the ultimate frozen showdown!
